post.text: With 15 days to go, Hillary and Elizabeth Warren hit the trail in New Hampshire. Join them: IWillVote.com

comment.author: Samantha
comment.text: Hillary Clinton supports late term abortions.. babies that would live outside the womb!!, she's says it's OK TO RIP BABIES INTO PIECES!! she's evil!!!!

replies.author: Nicholas
replies.text: No doctor performs late term abortions to a healthy child and mom; there is no such thing and that is not what she supports. Please educate yourself and stop repeating nonsense from Trump and Fox News.
